completedHtml:
When service scan is done, you will receive a slack message.
Thank you!

elements.name: Important information
elements.html:
Important information

Please make sure you are NOT running a security pentest against a service in PRODUCTION.
AppSec team has a limited list of endpoints that you are allowed to pentest.
If you want to run a security pentest against a service that is not whitelisted, please advise with AppSec team.
Security pentest is necessary to assess the security posture of our services, but it is forbidden to run them against random URLs that you can find on the web.

elements.name: severities
elements.title: Mark which severities you want to be included in the results

elements.name: slack_channel
elements.title: Enter slack channel to get scan results
